comment: The domain of the Lebesgue outer measure is the power set of the n-dimensional Real numbers. Step (a)(i) of the proof of Proposition 115D (a) of [Fremlin1] p. 30 (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)
